page.title: 12ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: There are three events in the year in which people who live in our area participate.Two are Summer events and one happens in the Winter. At one time if people wanted to celebrate Guy Fawkes they had a bonfire party in their own garden now we are safety conscious and the Community Council run a bonfire guy parade and fancy dress disco for everyone at the Burgh Hall. At the time of the Queen's Coronation there was a huge parade with floats and everyone young and old in fancy dress.A pupil from the Primary School was chosen to be Queen.In 1977 at the Jubilee This was revived and sports were held at the playing fields.Sports are still held but no Gala Queen is picked. The third event is one which has grown up in the last two years but now draws
